name: Boreal Dragon Wyrmling
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 20 ft.
description: This medium-sized dragon features icy scales and embodies the chaotic nature of its kind. It possesses the ability to fly gracefully and harnesses fiery breath, showcasing both agility and elemental power.
memorable: Capable of unleashing a fiery breath weapon that creates an area of dangerous embers, making it a formidable young dragon.
goals: To engage in skirmishes, utilizing its breath weapon to damage multiple foes.
environment: Typically found in icy or snowy areas.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage and resistance to cold damage enhance its survivability.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity and limited ranged options can hinder its effectiveness in certain situations.
attacks: Utilizes a potent bite attack for melee and unleashes Cinder Breath for area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Cinder Breath creates a 15-foot cone of superheated air, dealing significant fire damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet and a passive Perception of 15.
skills: Excels in athletics and perception, both at a +5 bonus.
additional_information: Has a high Armor Class due to natural armor.
Its breath weapon recharges on a roll of 5 or 6.
Capable of significant mobility with flying speed.
Can endure a good amount of damage before falling.
test_queries: dragon with immunity to fire damage
youthful dragon able to unleash embers
